name: remove-notification-menu
title: Remove Notification Menu
description: Disables the Notification Center from the system tray.
deepDescription: Disables the Windows Notification Center (Action Center) by setting the `DisableNotificationCenter` registry key under `HKCU\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer`. This removes the notification icon and blocks access to the notification sidebar. Requires Explorer restart.
warning: Disabling the notification menu may prevent you from seeing important system messages.
